Package com.testpaper.secure.controller

Class MyController

java.lang.Object
com.testpaper.secure.controller.MyController
@RestController @CrossOrigin public class MyController extends Object
The MyController class represents a RESTful API controller that handles various endpoints related to user roles and authorization. It provides endpoints for home, user, and admin pages, as well as an update page that requires the 'admin' authority.

  • Method Details

    • home

      @GetMapping("/") public String home()
      Retrieves the home page.
      Returns:
      The HTML content for the home page.

    • user

      @GetMapping("/user") public String user()
      Retrieves the user page.
      Returns:
      The HTML content for the user page.

    • admin

      @GetMapping(value="/admin", produces={"application/json","application/xml"}) public String admin()
      Retrieves the admin page.
      Returns:
      The HTML content for the admin page.

    • update

      @GetMapping("/update") @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'admin\')") public String update(Principal p)
      Retrieves the update page. Requires the 'admin' authority.
      Parameters:
      p - The Principal object representing the authenticated user.
      Returns:
      The HTML content for the update page, including the username and user ID.
      See Also:
      • Principal
      • User
      • User
      • UserRepository.findByUsername(String)

    • user1

      @GetMapping("/user1") @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'user\')") public String user1(Principal p)
      Retrieves the user1ex page. Requires the 'user' authority.
      Parameters:
      p - The Principal object representing the authenticated user.
      Returns:
      The HTML content for the user1ex page, including the username and user ID.
